name: Space Time Looper
description:
Space Time Looper

Loop through space time in this unique puzzle game!

This is a unique puzzle game where you drag portals around with the mouse!

Go through 6 interesting levels that each use the game mechanics in a different way!

Controls: 

Right/Left: Move

Spacebar: Jump

Drag The Portals Around With the Mouse!

Submitted for the black and white game jam.
